title: java.lang.NullPointerException:Attempt to invoke virtual method 'java.lang.Object java.lang.ref.WeakReference.get()' on a null object reference
body:
version：2.1.2 

below is the crash log：

1 java.lang.RuntimeException:An error occurred while executing doInBackground()
--
2 android.os.AsyncTask$3.done(AsyncTask.java:309)
3 ......
